mods.name: Dextermod: One_Hit_Wonder_10
mods.author: CK_Dexterhaven
mods.description: Enhances Peerless Lumberjack and Lucky Strike talents for a 10% higher chance of chopping trees or mining voxels in just one hit.

mods.name: Dextermod: One_Hit_Wonder_25
mods.author: CK_Dexterhaven
mods.description: Enhances Peerless Lumberjack and Lucky Strike talents for a 25% higher chance of chopping trees or mining voxels in just one hit.

mods.name: Dextermod: One_Hit_Wonder_50
mods.author: CK_Dexterhaven
mods.description: Enhances Peerless Lumberjack and Lucky Strike talents for a 50% higher chance of chopping trees or mining voxels in just one hit.

mods.name: Dextermod: One_Hit_Wonder_65
mods.author: CK_Dexterhaven
mods.description: Enhances Peerless Lumberjack and Lucky Strike talents for a 65% higher chance of chopping trees or mining voxels in just one hit.

mods.name: Dextermod: Bifrost_Titanium_Crossbow
mods.author: CK_Dexterhaven
mods.description: Requires more resources to craft, hits harder and has a much higher ammo capacity. This mod replaces the vanilla Titanium Crossbow, crafted in the Fabricator, with this more expensive and powerful version.

mods.name: Dextermod: Stackable Crop Plots
mods.author: CK_Dexterhaven
mods.description: All four tiers of crop plots are now stackable, up to a stack of 20.

mods.name: Dextermod: Enhanced Tactical Backpack
mods.author: CK_Dexterhaven
mods.description: A greatly enhanced version of the Larkwell-Martinez Tactical Backpack.

mods.name: Dextermod: T5 Armor
mods.author: CK_Dexterhaven
mods.description: Exotic-infused upgrade to your existing Composite armor.

mods.name: Dextermod: Stronger HVAC
mods.author: CK_Dexterhaven
mods.description: This mod greatly increases the range of the Heavy Heater, the Heavy Air Conditioner, and the Dehumidifiers.

mods.name: BigBoxStack
mods.author: CK_Dexterhaven
mods.description: With this mod, you can now stack your MXC Crate, Preservation Crate, or your Deep Freeze up to 3 high.

mods.name: Dexterlabs Panther Suit Module
mods.author: CK_Dexterhaven
mods.description: This powerful suit module replaces the Patcher I and combines characteristics of multiple modules.

mods.name: Something Fishy!
mods.author: CK_Dexterhaven
mods.description: Designed to dramatically improve fishing. Craftable in the Fishing Bench: a new rod, lure, and trap with greater recipe requirements, but improved buffs.

mods.name: Tactical Icebox Backpack
mods.author: CK_Dexterhaven
mods.description: This very powerful, practical backpack has all the attributes of the Larkwell-Martinez Tactical above, but also prevents your food from spoiling on long journeys. Expensive to craft on the Fabricator, but worth it! Recommended to craft two so you can keep one charging up at a Charging Station.

mods.name: Tactical Deluxe Backpack
mods.author: CK_Dexterhaven
mods.description: This very powerful, practical backpack has all the attributes of the Larkwell-Martinez Tactical above, but also prevents your food from spoiling on long journeys. In addition, this enhanced version includes the attributes of all top-tier workshop backpacks. Expensive to craft on the Fabricator, but worth it! Recommended to craft two so you can keep one charging up at a Charging Station.

mods.name: Dexterhaven Labs
mods.author: CK_Dexterhaven
mods.description: Introduces a custom tab to the Orbital Workshop, containing many useful items.

mods.name: Dexterlabs Panther Suit Module Mark2
mods.author: CK_Dexterhaven
mods.description: A more powerful and mutually exlusive version of the Panther suit module, this incorporates the What is This talent (for a chance of exotics when mining metals) and reivies the Gifts of Tartarus from CritFail, removing cave sickness.

mods.name: Dextermod: WaldoPak
mods.author: CK_Dexterhaven
mods.description: Brings back the enhanced Exotic repair pack from WZG.

mods.name: Dextermods: Ultimate Fertilizer
mods.author: CK_Dexterhaven
mods.description: Crafted only on the chemistry bench, these two recipes replace the Recovery and Resistance Fertilizers. While they require more resources to craft, they combine and surpass all features of the other fertilizer varieties
